Preview Timnas U-19 Indonesia Vs Hong Kong Jumat Hari Ini
07 Nov 2019, 22:21 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Timnas U-19 Indonesia bersiap menghadapi Hong Kong dalam lanjutan Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020 di Stadion Madya Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta, Jumat, 8 November 2019. Pertandingan akan dimulai pukul 19.00 WIB dan disiarkan RCTI.
Indonesia saat ini memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 3 setelah di laga sebelumnya mengalahkan Timor Leste 3-1. Hong Kong sendiri hanya bermain imbang 1-1 dengan Korea Utara.
Pelatih Timnas U-19 Fakhri Husaini mengatakan, skuatnya mewaspadai lawan. “Organisasi permainan Hong Kong cukup rapi dan pertahanan mereka disiplin,” ujar dia.
Menurut Fakhri, kualitas Hong Kong terlihat jelas ketika mereka menahan imbang tim kuat Korea Utara. Saat itu, Hong Kong yang tertekan nyaris sepanjang pertandingan mampu mencetak gol terlebih dahulu melalui penyerang Lau Ka Kiu.
Skuat asuhan pelatiih Thorlakur Arnason bisa bertahan dengan baik hingga laga usai dan membuat Korea Utara cuma bisa mencuri satu gol di menit ke-66 via sepakan pemain pengganti Ri Jo Guk.
"Hong Kong juga memiliki peluang berbahaya meski mereka terus ditekan," tutur Fakhri
Situasi seperti itu sangat dihindari oleh pelatih yang membawa Indonesia juara Piala AFF U-16 2018.
Dia ingin para pemainnya mampu menjebol gawang Hong Kong di setiap kesempatan. Tidak seperti saat melawan Timor Leste, Rabu, ketika timnas U-19 hanya mampu membuat tiga gol di tengah banyaknya peluang.
“Kami tentu mengevaluasi hal ini, baik secara teknis maupun mental. Saya akan berdiskusi dengan pemain agar mereka bisa mengetahui kesalahan di pertandingan sebelumnya,” kata Fakhri.
Tim Hong Kong termotivasi untuk menaklukkan Indonesia, setelah menahan imbang Korea Utara dengan skor 1-1. “Hasil itu mengejutkan dan memberikan kami kepercayaan diri. Sebelumnya, kami selalu kalah dari Korea Utara, tetapi kami bisa menahan imbang mereka kemarin. Saya yakin kami bisa melakukannya lagi saat menghadapi Indonesia,” ujar pelatih Hong Kong Thorlakur Arnason.
Meski senang dengan performa skuatnya ketika berhadapan dengan Korea Utara, pria yang juga menjabat direktur teknik Asosiasi Sepak bola Hong Kong (HKFA) tersebut merasa yakin performa timnya masih bisa berkembang.
Dalam laga kontra Korea Utara, Hong Kong tampil disiplin sepanjang pertandingan dan unggul lebih dahulu melalui kaki penyerang Lau Ka Kiu. Korea Utara yang sejatinya menguasai pertandingan baru bisa melesakkan bola ke dalam gawang Hong Kong pada menit ke-66 melalui sepakan pemain pengganti Ri Jo Guk.
Sementara terkait timnas U-19 Indonesia, Thorlakur menilai bahwa anak-anak asuh pelatih Fakhri Husaini merupakan tim yang bagus dan secara kualitas ada di atas skuatnya.
“Mereka sudah bersama-sama sejak lama dan telah melewati banyak pertandingan. Namun setiap tim mempunyai kelemahan dan kami akan memanfaatkan itu,” tutur pria asal Islandia tersebut.
Sebelum pertandingan Timnas U-19 Indonesia vs Hong Kong, mulai pukul 15.30 WIB berlangsung partai Timor Leste versus Korea Utara.

Preview U-19 Indonesia National Team vs Hong Kong Friday Today
Nov 7 2019, 22:21 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Indonesian U-19 national team prepares to face Hong Kong in the continuation of the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup at the Bung Karno Madya Stadium, Jakarta, Friday, November 8, 2019. The match will start at 19.00 WIB and will be broadcast by RCTI.
Indonesia currently tops the standings with a value of 3 after the previous fight defeated Timor Leste 3-1. Hong Kong itself only drew 1-1 with North Korea.
U-19 national team coach Fakhri Husaini said his squad was wary of opponents. "The Hong Kong game organization is pretty neat and their defense is disciplined," he said.
According to Fakhri, Hong Kong's quality was clearly seen when they drew against a strong North Korean team. At that time, Hong Kong, who was depressed for most of the match, was able to score first through striker Lau Ka Kiu.
Thorlakur's trainer, Thorlakur Arnason, survived well until the fight was over and allowed North Korea to only steal one goal in the 66th minute via kicking substitute Ri Jo Guk.
"Hong Kong also has a dangerous opportunity even though they continue to be pressured," said Fakhri
Such a situation was greatly avoided by the coach who brought Indonesia the 2018 AFF U-16 Cup champion.
He wants his players to be able to break through the Hong Kong goal at every opportunity. Unlike when against Timor Leste, Wednesday, when the U-19 national team was only able to make three goals in the midst of many opportunities.
"We certainly evaluate this, both technically and mentally. I will discuss with the players so they can find out the mistakes in the previous match, "said Fakhri.
The Hong Kong team was motivated to conquer Indonesia, after holding North Korea to a 1-1 draw. "The results were surprising and gave us confidence. Before, we always lost to North Korea, but we were able to draw against them yesterday. I am sure we can do it again when facing Indonesia, "said Hong Kong coach Thorlakur Arnason.
Although pleased with his squad's performance when dealing with North Korea, the man who also serves as the technical director of the Hong Kong Football Association (HKFA) feels confident that his team's performance can still develop.
In the match against North Korea, Hong Kong appeared disciplined throughout the match and took the lead through the legs of striker Lau Ka Kiu. North Korea, which actually controlled the new game, could hit the ball into the goal of Hong Kong in the 66th minute through kicking substitute Ri Jo Guk.
While related to the Indonesian U-19 national team, Thorlakur considered that the coaches of Fakhri Husaini's foster children were a good team and were in quality above his squad.
"They have been together for a long time and have gone through many matches. But every team has weaknesses and we will use that, "said the man from Iceland.
Before the Indonesia U-19 national team match vs. Hong Kong, starting at 15.30 WIB the East Timor party versus North Korea took place.
